actions.command: env
mkdir -p /tmp/build/${hex.id}
echo Pulling hex; go get -d github.com/hexbotio/hex
echo Pulling hex-ssh; go get -d github.com/hexbotio/hex-ssh
echo Pulling hex-local; go get -d github.com/hexbotio/hex-local
echo Pulling hex-response; go get -d github.com/hexbotio/hex-response
echo Pulling hex-twilio; go get -d github.com/hexbotio/hex-twilio
echo Pulling hex-validate; go get -d github.com/hexbotio/hex-validate
echo Pulling hex-winrm; go get -d github.com/hexbotio/hex-winrm
echo Testing; go test github.com/hexbotio/hex/parse
echo Building hex; go install -ldflags "-X main.version=${hex.input.2}" github.com/hexbotio/hex
echo Building hex-ssh; go install github.com/hexbotio/hex-ssh
echo Building hex-local; go install github.com/hexbotio/hex-local
echo Building hex-response; go install github.com/hexbotio/hex-response
echo Building hex-twilio; go install github.com/hexbotio/hex-twilio
echo Building hex-validate; go install github.com/hexbotio/hex-validate
echo Building hex-winrm; go install github.com/hexbotio/hex-winrm
mkdir -p ${hex.var.downloads}${hex.input.2}
cp $GOBIN/* ${hex.var.downloads}${hex.input.2}/
for f in ${hex.var.downloads}${hex.input.2}/*; do md5sum $f | awk '{print $1}' > $f.md5; done
rm -rf /tmp/build/${hex.id}
Deploy to Downloads for ${hex.input.2}
